title: Real Mallorca vs Real Madrid - La Liga 2019/20: Live score and updates
text:
Real Madrid will have their sights set on the La Liga summit this evening when Zinedine Zidane's men travel to struggling Real Mallorca.

The visitors can overtake current table toppers Barcelona with three points and extend their unbeaten streak in the division, which currently stands at eight matches.

Mallorca are languishing in the relegation zone but will hope to build on their home victory against Espanyol before the international break.

Sportsmail's Matt Porter will provide live La Liga coverage of Real Mallorca vs Real Madrid including score, lineups and build-up.
description: Real Madrid will have their sights set on the La Liga summit this evening when Zinedine Zidane's men travel to struggling Real Mallorca. Follow LIVE HERE with Sportsmail's Matt Porter.
